personal.name: Yamuna Latchipatruni
personal.title: Computer Science & Data Science Student
personal.tagline: Building intelligent solutions through code, data, and design thinking
personal.bio: I'm a driven Computer Science and Data Science student, passionate about blending design thinking with technical acumen to build solutions that improve everyday experiences. With a strong foundation in machine learning, data analytics, and full-stack development, I thrive on transforming complex problems into elegant, scalable solutions.
personal.shortBio: Passionate about building scalable ML systems and solving real-world problems through continuous learning and structured execution.

experience.description: Leading promotional strategies for AI/ML workshops and technical events, fostering community engagement among data science enthusiasts.
highlights: Managed social media campaigns for AI/ML workshops
Coordinated technical events and community initiatives
Promoted data science awareness across campus

education.degree: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering

projects.title: AI Research Assistant
projects.subtitle: Semantic Retrieval System
projects.description: A FAISS-based vector search system with speech-to-text integration for efficient exploration of large research datasets. Features modular ML pipelines and visualization workflows for structured data querying.
highlights: Built semantic vector search with FAISS

projects.title: Predictive Maintenance System
projects.subtitle: Anomaly Detection Platform
projects.description: Developed predictive models using LSTM, Autoencoders, and Isolation Forest on industrial sensor datasets. Features a Streamlit dashboard for real-time anomaly monitoring and decision support.

projects.title: LegalEase
projects.subtitle: AI-Powered Legal Document Assistant
projects.description: A full-stack application using Django, React, and Google Cloud services. Features document summarization, keyword extraction, multilingual support, and secure authentication workflows.

achievements.title: JP Morgan Code for Good Winner
achievements.description: Selected through rigorous coding and HireVue rounds; developed a winning technology solution for Reaching Roots NGO during the national-level hackathon.

achievements.title: Technovista Blogathon Winner
achievements.description: Secured 1st place for a comprehensive technical blog on Deepfake Technology among all participating students.
